definitions.definition: A complex polysaccharide , a polymer of N - acetylglucosamine , found in the exoskeletons of arthropods and in the cell walls of fungi ; thought to be responsible for some forms of asthma in humans.

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A complex polysaccharide , a polymer of N - acetylglucosamine , found in the exoskeletons of arthropods and in the cell walls of fungi ; thought to be responsible for some forms of asthma in humans.
